name: AnimalWorkout
skdetail:
This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: animal workout
des:
The kids need something to do (or maybe you just need a break from the wonderful darlings). Look no further - this skill, Animal Workout, allows kids to become different animals while getting exercise. Animal Workout will offer up encouraging words as they go along to also boost motivation and confidence. This skill is great for rainy days and sunny days too!

When in the skill, to continue on say ‘More’ and when you’re finished say ‘All Done’.

Update History:
Dec 2020 - Removed in-skill purchasing and made all content free. There is nothing purchasable and no upsells in this skill.
Jun 2019 - Added expansion pack option with 55 new animals and moves including make-believe creatures, farm animals, bugs, and more
May 2019 - Per user feedback, removed reference to climbing and fixed animal scrolling issue on echo spots
Dec 2018 - Added voice over, sounds effects, and new music to all animals
Oct 2018 - Added images for screen devices
Jun 2018 - Added more animals, including a monster - rar!

Voice over by Envy McKee
Illustrations, including icon, by Drawkman
Music from Chad Tenwick Audio, Pond 5, with introduction by FreeSFX
priv: The developer reported that this skill does not collect personal information.
